name: merkle-generator
description: ElasticSwap merkle tree generator for reward pools
author: 0xean <0xean.eth@gmail.com>

scripts.lint: yarn run prettier && yarn run lint:js
scripts.prettier:js: npx prettier --write src/*.mjs --write src/**/*.mjs --write src/**/**/*.mjs --write src/**/**/**/*.mjs
scripts.prettier:test: npx prettier --write test/*.mjs --write test/**/*.mjs --write test/**/**/*.mjs --write test/**/**/**/*.mjs
